Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


Spectinomycin binds the 70S ribosome and inhibits translocation of peptidal tRNA's from the A site to the P site during protein synthesis with an IC50 of 10 μM.
No sentence with the required information was found, however, one sentence with a unit was found: 
The bombarded leaves were allowed to incubate in dark for 48 hours to recover from tissue damage and then were placed on RMOP medium containing 500 μg/ml spectinomycin for two rounds of selection on plates and subsequently moved to jars with MSO medium containing 500 μg/ml spectinomycin
